headline: Ecolab Stock Jumps as Outlook Tops Estimates
summary: Ecolab shares jumped to be among the top S&P 500 gainers Tuesday, as the company posted a current quarter and 2025 outlook that topped analysts’ estimates amid “growth trends” in water, hygiene and infection prevention.

headline: Ecolab Q4: Solid EPS Growth, Industrial And Institutional Acceleration, 2025 Momentum And More
summary: Ecolab Inc (NYSE:ECL) shares are trading higher after the company reported fourth-quarter sales growth of 2% year-on-year to $4.005 billion, beating the consensus estimate of $3.99 billion. Organic sales grew 4%, led by strong growth in the Industrial and Healthcare & Life Sciences segments and the Pest Elimination and Institutional & Specialty segments. In fixed currency, Global Industrial sales grew 4% to $2.067 billion, Global Institutional & Specialty climbed 6% to $1.367 billion, Global Hea

headline: Ecolab shares rise on solid 2025 profit forecast; Q4 results match estimates
summary: Investing.com -- Ecolab (NYSE:ECL) posted in-line results for the fourth quarter and issued upbeat guidance for the full fiscal 2025, sending its shares rising more than 4% in premarket trading Tuesday.

headline: Ecolab: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The average estimate of nine analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.79 per share. The cleaning, food-safety and pest-control services company posted revenue of $4.01 billion in the period, which also beat Street forecasts. Eight analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $3.97 billion.
